name: PeopleSoft: Never delete a field from a standard panel
description: Identify each page field in the Vanilla not in the project environment
output: Failed checks gives the number of pages that contain deleted page field. The page field name (detected in the vanilla) can be found in the value column
rationale:
Standard objects are often referenced in many parts of the system. Deleting one of them can impact every part of the system that access to it.
Unnecessarily field in the page should be hidden
remediation: Restore the page field from the Vanilla
